name: Louse on the Loose
description:
Was it the neighbor's annoying kid? Your pet? A secret government project? You don't know where you came from, exactly, but you seem to be a very buff and persistent louse crawling on some poor human's scalp, wreaking all sorts of havoc!

Kill other mutated horrors, adopt lice and help speed up this human's baldness in this short-yet-fun action game, made for the Global Game Jam 2023! This game may or may not include:

  • Lice! (Obviously)
  • Skin! Lots of it! (Take care if it grosses you out)
  • Trans rights!
  • One or several violations of the Geneva Convention!
  • And LOADS of fun!

Will you perish, or will you get to plant your flag on their scalp and claim it as yours?
